4f5286bb-830f-4fae-ab5e-f9b02ea9b86e.name: Directional
4f5286bb-830f-4fae-ab5e-f9b02ea9b86e.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

84ac021c-e350-4ba0-97c2-1f2651c8d37f.name: Tough Skin
84ac021c-e350-4ba0-97c2-1f2651c8d37f.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

bcffece9-fc7f-4092-ba93-0b00689a4a0d.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

179ec15f-42bb-4c50-a852-8ae7c8115cc3.name: Diffuse
179ec15f-42bb-4c50-a852-8ae7c8115cc3.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

ebbd2146-e4cc-49ad-9b2e-c9f76b98f597.name: Homogenous
ebbd2146-e4cc-49ad-9b2e-c9f76b98f597.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

54a48ecd-58c9-423b-83d9-0f809b9a035e.name: No Blood
54a48ecd-58c9-423b-83d9-0f809b9a035e.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

2473a45b-6391-48d0-be57-0218da37175c.name: No Brain
2473a45b-6391-48d0-be57-0218da37175c.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

c997f355-d6a9-4f59-9715-e04f9d5b9309.name: No Eyes
c997f355-d6a9-4f59-9715-e04f9d5b9309.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

8cba7b6c-6a5b-4ef8-a7c8-3a2aa0ed1630.name: No Head
8cba7b6c-6a5b-4ef8-a7c8-3a2aa0ed1630.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

5ae2a20c-c4d9-4df3-9336-eec6830b4c0b.name: No Neck
5ae2a20c-c4d9-4df3-9336-eec6830b4c0b.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

c8d482a1-edd3-4cc4-9113-5566d0c8083a.name: No Vitals
c8d482a1-edd3-4cc4-9113-5566d0c8083a.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

c4837f9d-b07d-4832-972d-4427a503715a.name: Unliving
c4837f9d-b07d-4832-972d-4427a503715a.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

834c113e-1ca1-4a65-be85-832cc427a7a4.name: Oxygen Storage
834c113e-1ca1-4a65-be85-832cc427a7a4.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

42591b51-1d9e-4e11-a2a0-f8dc7184eefb.name: Oxygen Storage
42591b51-1d9e-4e11-a2a0-f8dc7184eefb.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

bbf3764a-bc66-45b1-8ff6-47333a74776a.name: Oxygen Storage
bbf3764a-bc66-45b1-8ff6-47333a74776a.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

2bc337cd-477c-4222-bc89-bd7a2afddc7d.name: Oxygen Storage
2bc337cd-477c-4222-bc89-bd7a2afddc7d.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

3f9cbf47-69a9-47a6-a07e-9c3135d5ce1e.name: Oxygen Storage
3f9cbf47-69a9-47a6-a07e-9c3135d5ce1e.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal
